result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Armando G Rodriguez

records.addlTxt:
10:56 AM Defendant Armando G Rodriguez appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Joseph Corcoran in court for Armando G Rodriguez.  Attorney Jessica L. Krejcarek in court for State of Wisconsin.  Clerk HM.  Motion to withdraw filed.  DE has new charges and Atty Rose represents DE in that file.  Motion granted.  Adjmt granted. Bond continued.
Final pre-trial scheduled for January 6, 2023 at 09:30 am.

10:43 AM Defendant Armando G Rodriguez appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Joseph Corcoran in court for Armando G Rodriguez.  Attorney Jessica L. Krejcarek in court for State of Wisconsin. Clerk HM.  22CF632 scheduled 10/5 10am.  Co-def scheduled 10/27 1030am.  Atty Corcoran requests all cases be scheduled together on 10/27 1030am.  Bond continued.
Final pre-trial scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 10:30 am.
DE's  NASJ  and NOH returned UTF.
Pre-trial conference on September 29, 2022 at 10:00 am.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: Notice of assignment of judge returned. Return to sender. Attempted, not known. Unable to forward.
of Judge filed by Atty Corcoran

Defendant Armando G Rodriguez appeared with Attorney Joseph Corcoran.  Defendant in custody. Attorney Daniel Alejandro Bernard Deida appeared for the Prosecution.    Clerk JT  Minutes:   ST called witness KPD Ofc Albert Gonzales; sworn in and testified; cross-examination by Atty Corcoran. ST rested and moved for bind over; arguments heard. Probable cause found; bound over for trial. Information filed; reading waived. Not guilty pleas entered. Scheduling Order given to Attorney in court.   Bond continued.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for October 5, 2022 at 10:00 am.

122PM - 123PM    Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Joseph Corcoran.   Clerk PU Minutes:   Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 10 days; Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 7, 2022 at 09:00 am..  Cash bond continued w/ same conditions (see previous bond entry). rb

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Defendant Armando G Rodriguez in court, in custody.  Attorney Alexandra Kathleen Smathers appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  SPD has been unable to appoint an attorney for DE for today's hearing. Court holds colloquy with DE re: proceeding pro se or waiving time to allow SPD to appoint an attorney.  DE waives time for preliminary hearing. Court reschedules preliminary hearing to an attorney status hearing.  Bond continued.  Status conference scheduled for June 29, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  No drug paraphenalia.  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Fernando C.-N.

01:53 PM 
  Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Ian Mickelson.  Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES:  Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 10 days; set before Commissioner on 5/18/22 @ 830am.  $200,000  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).  Atty moves to dismiss Cts 1&4.  Arguments heard.  Court denies motion.    jk
